womenswear.title: ASYMMETRIC SATIN DRESS
womenswear.description: Midi dress with a cowl neckline, asymmetric strap and an open back.

womenswear.title: LOS ANGELES T-SHIRT
womenswear.description: OVERSIZE - ROUND NECK - NORMAL LENGTH - SHORT SLEEVES. T-shirt made of 100% cotton. Round neck and drop-shoulder short sleeves. Contrast slogan detail.

womenswear.title: DENIM-EFFECT WIDE-LEG TROUSERS
womenswear.description: High-waist wide-leg trousers with elasticated waistband at the back. Front pockets and back patch pockets. Front zip and button fastening.

womenswear.title: SPLIT LEATHER SANDALS WITH BUCKLES
womenswear.description: Split leather flat slider sandals. Wide straps and buckles. Round toe. Sole height: 2 cm. / 0.7″

womenswear.title: CONTRAST SHOPPER BAG
womenswear.description: Contrast shopper bag. Fabric exterior. Top handles and shoulder straps. Removable inner organiser pocket. Height x Length x Width 31 x 50 x 13 cm. / 12.2 x 19.6 x 5.1″

menswear.title: T-SHIRT WITH SLOGAN
menswear.description: Boxy fit T-shirt with a round neck and short sleeves. Contrast slogan prints on the front and back.

menswear.title: BERMUDA SHORTS
menswear.description: Relaxed fit Bermuda shorts in textured fabric. Elasticated waistband with adjustable drawstring, side pockets and a back patch pocket.

menswear.title: LEATHER ESPADRILLES
menswear.description: Leather espadrilles with a split leather finish. Soft design. Jute-covered sole.

menswear.title: HOODED TECHNICAL JACKET
menswear.description: Jacket made of technical fabric. High neck with adjustable hood. Long sleeves with adjustable hook-and-loop straps on the cuffs. Zip pockets on the chest and hip. Zip-up front.

menswear.title: CAP WITH CONTRAST EMBROIDERY
menswear.description: Cap with flat peak. Contrast embroidery on the front. Faded effect. Adjustable back.

kidswear.title: PRINTED T-SHIRT
kidswear.description: T-shirt with a round neck, short sleeves, trim detail on the neck and front print.

kidswear.title: PLAIN TROUSERS WITH POCKETS
kidswear.description: Trousers with an elasticated waistband and adjustable drawstrings. Rear patch pockets.

kidswear.title: CONTRAST LEATHER BLEND SNEAKERS
kidswear.description: Contrast sneakers in a leather blend. Fastening with two hook-and-loop straps. 100% cotton flexible insole and lining. Rubber sole.

kidswear.title: TWILL OVERSHIRT
kidswear.description: Collared overshirt with long sleeves. Front snap-button fastening and patch pockets on the chest.

kidswear.title: HEART SUNGLASSES
kidswear.description: Sunglasses with a heart-shaped resin frame. 100% UV PROTECTION. CATEGORY 3.
